author: Didier M
title: Outstanding, well renovated charm hotel in one of Pris truly Parisian quarters
text:
Top of my recommendations
Nice hotel, building from XVIIIth century beautifully restored. Nice service, quiet, charming.
Rooms are nice, public spaces are well designed, good champain at the bar...
Unconditionally recommended!
